triples.name: Proximal policy optimization
triples.relevance: PPO is the core reinforcement learning algorithm studied in this paper for multi-agent cooperative games.

triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The paper studies reinforcement learning algorithms in the context of multi-agent systems.

triples.name: Multi-agent learning
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on multi-agent reinforcement learning settings and cooperative behavior.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: PPO is a policy gradient method, which is central to understanding the algorithm's approach.

triples.name: Cooperative game theory
triples.relevance: The paper studies PPO in cooperative multi-agent game environments.

triples.name: StarCraft
triples.relevance: StarCraft multi-agent challenge is one of the four main benchmarks used to evaluate PPO performance.

triples.name: Hanabi
triples.relevance: Hanabi challenge is one of the four main testbeds used to evaluate multi-agent PPO performance.

triples.name: Hyperparameter optimization
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates that PPO achieves strong performance with minimal hyperparameter tuning.

triples.name: Ablation
triples.relevance: Ablation studies are conducted to analyze which implementation and hyperparameter factors are critical to PPO's performance.

triples.name: Empirical analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes empirical findings demonstrating PPO's effectiveness in cooperative multi-agent games with practical implementation guidelines.
